formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: A \cup B = \{x : x \in A \text{ or } x \in B\}
formulas.raw: A \cup B = \{x : x \in A \text{ or } x \in B\}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: A \cap B = \{x : x \in A \text{ and } x \in B\}
formulas.raw: A \cap B = \{x : x \in A \text{ and } x \in B\}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: A \setminus B = \{x : x \in A \text{ and } x \notin B\}
formulas.raw: A \setminus B = \{x : x \in A \text{ and } x \notin B\}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: A^{c} = U \setminus A = \{x : x \in U \text{ and } x \notin A\}.
formulas.raw: A^{c} = U \setminus A = \{x : x \in U \text{ and } x \notin A\}.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ A \cup B = \{x : x \in A \text{ or } x \in B\} \] \[ A \cap B = \{x : x \in A \text{ and } x \in B\} \] \[ A \setminus B = \{x : x \in A \text{ and } x \notin B\} \] \[ A \Delta B = (A \setminus B) \cup (B \setminus A) \]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ A^{c} = U \setminus A = \{x : x \in U \text{ and } x \notin A\}. \]
